title: Wake up Art Cullagh
content:
t Art. Tell Halsin about Art Cullagh. Investigate the House of Healing. Show the lute to Art.

Wake up Art Cullagh Walkthrough

Enter the Last Light Inn, then enter the door on the right to find Art Cullagh in a catatonic state. Cullagh repeats a song about "Thaniel". (Halsin will tell you more about Thaniel if he's alive.) Speak to Art and to the NPCs (Jeh'lar) around him to receive the next objective (read the worn letter to learn that Art Cullagh was gripped by shadowfell after his investigat
